verses.name: Genesis 42:20
verses.text: But bring your youngest brother unto me; so shall your words be verified, and ye shall not die. And they did so.

verses.name: Genesis 42:21
verses.text: And they said one to another, We are verily guilty concerning our brother, in that we saw the anguish of his soul, when he besought us, and we would not hear; therefore is this distress come upon us.

verses.name: Genesis 42:22
verses.text: And Reuben answered them, saying, Spake I not unto you, saying, Do not sin against the child; and ye would not hear? therefore, behold, also his blood is required.
